description: A peaceful East Blue town that has been taken over and terrorized by Buggy the Clown and his pirate crew. The town's inhabitants have mostly fled, leaving it nearly deserted.

keyEvents.title: Nami's First Appearance
keyEvents.description: Nami introduces herself to Luffy in Orange Town as a thief who specializes in robbing pirates.
keyEvents.significance: Orange Town serves as the setting for Nami's introduction and the beginning of the Orange Town Arc.

keyEvents.title: Arrival at Orange Town
keyEvents.description: Luffy arrives at Orange Town and discovers it is under Buggy's control.
keyEvents.significance: Sets the stage for the conflict with Buggy and the events of the Orange Town Arc.

keyEvents.title: Buggy Ball Demonstration
keyEvents.description: Buggy fires a Buggy Ball that destroys an entire row of houses in Orange Town.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the destruction Buggy has caused to the town and his disregard for the people's homes.

keyEvents.title: Bara Bara no Mi Powers Revealed
keyEvents.description: Buggy reveals his Devil Fruit powers in Orange Town during his battle with Zoro.
keyEvents.significance: Orange Town witnesses the first demonstration of the Bara Bara no Mi's abilities in the series.

statusHistory.reason: Town is under occupation by the Buggy Pirates
